content.rendered:
For our garden lovers, our exclusive potted Hydrangea plants are the perfect addition to your outdoor plant family.

With their fluffy, cloud-like flowers and evergreen foliage, potted Hydrangea plants offer the perfect blend of fresh floral beauty and a gift that continues to give. You can add them to your patio or replant them in your garden for a wonderful addition.

Each Hydrangea plant is carefully selected personally by us, then potted into a white ceramic planter, finished with moss and trailing ribbon.

The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we embrace this, with no two plants the same! Images are provided for illustrative purposes only. Plant dimensions and colour vary depending on seasons and availability. Entrust us to select the finest Hydrangea varieties for you, knowing that we will deliver nature’s best.

Pot size: 21cm H x 21cm W approx.

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.
